concept.title: Step 1: Start with remote debugger mode

conbody.p: Start via CLI using this command:
The <katalon_installed_folder> is the absolute path to Katalon installed folder.
If you are using macOS, the <katalon_installed_folder> should be /Applications/Katalon Studio.app/Contents/MacOS.
The address=8000 is a local port number, JVM will allow a debugger to attach to via this port. You can change to another port if needed.
